featured.text: It is an eco-friendly and biodegradable fiber.
In addition, the leftover material following the removal of fibers can even be used as a natural fertilizer back in the pineapple fields.
The idea was developed when a Spanish designer travelling to the Philippines observed a traditional Filipino shirt 22 together with the fibers of pineapple leaves.
The soybean’s high fiber content is beneficial in preventing digestive disorders.

definition.zh_def: 纖維：一種細長的物質，通常用於製造布料或食品，對於消化系統有益。
definition.en_def: Fiber: A long, slender substance often used in the production of textiles or food, beneficial for the digestive system.
definition.example: Eating foods high in fiber can help improve digestion.
